text: One of the very beautiful attractive place in Geylang singapore, its name is Kallang Basin because I think this is a small lake looks like abasin. Not too much crowded and you can spend your time very freely. Nice breez also there, very relaxing envioranment
was here for a production and spotted these family of otters! what a quaint little place to walk and jog.
Interesting that there is a fountain here! Itâ€™s a single water spout and it lights up with various colour changes.

Had a kayak here. It was a great experience!!
Except there was a plastic bottle in the river :/
And there were waves too, I recommend kayaking here if you have not, it was fun :)
